attribute_fields.COMMENTS: the decision table is used to test the rule engine

context_details.context_description: local int BMILength = the length of bMI_Devs
context_details.context_postfix: bMI_Devs length cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

initial_action_details.initial_action_description: sort bMI_Devs in descending order by $dateTime
sort floors_Devs in descending order by $dateTime
sort hR_Devs in descending order by $dateTime
sort sleep_Devs in descending order by $dateTime
sort steps_Devs in descending order by $dateTime
sort weight_Devs in descending order by $dateTime

action_details.action_description: perform Examine_MALE
perform Examine_FEMALE
perform Calculate

context_details.context_postfix: bMI_Devs 0 getat cve allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: local date now = the current date
context_details.context_postfix: getdate cvd allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: local int gap = days from bMI_tmp's dateTime to now
context_details.context_postfix: 0 local@ entitypush dateTime entitypop 1 local@ daysbetween cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

condition_details.condition_postfix: 0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop 20.7 f>= { pop 0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop 26.4 f< } over if
0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop 26.4 f>= { pop 0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop 27.8 f< } over if
0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop 27.8 f>= { pop 0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop 31.1 f< } over if

action_details.action_description: add a new result entity to the context of this table
add the result to the patient's results
action_details.action_postfix: result patient entitypush results swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultCode = 0
set the result's resultMessage = "underweight"
set the result's resultMessage = "normal"
set the result's resultMessage = "marginally overweight"
action_details.action_postfix: "marginally overweight" cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultMessage = "overwight"
set the result's resultMessage = "very overweight or obese"
action_details.action_postfix: "very overweight or obese" cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultMessage = the result's resultMessage + " --->from" + gap + "days ago's data:"+bMI_tmp's bMI
action_details.action_postfix: result entitypush resultMessage " --->from" strconcat 2 local@ strconcat "days ago's data:" strconcat 0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop strconcat entitypop cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

context_details.context_postfix: bMI_Devs 0 getat cve allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: local date now = the current date
context_details.context_postfix: getdate cvd allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: local int gap = days from bMI_tmp's dateTime to now
context_details.context_postfix: 0 local@ entitypush dateTime entitypop 1 local@ daysbetween cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

condition_details.condition_postfix: 0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop 19.1 f>= { pop 0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop 25.8 f< } over if
0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop 25.8 f>= { pop 0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop 27.3 f< } over if
0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop 27.3 f>= { pop 0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop 32.3 f< } over if

action_details.action_description: add a new result entity to the context of this table
add the result to the patient's results
action_details.action_postfix: result patient entitypush results swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultCode = 0
set the result's resultMessage = "underweight"
set the result's resultMessage = "normal"
set the result's resultMessage = "marginally overweight"
action_details.action_postfix: "marginally overweight" cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultMessage = "overwight"
set the result's resultMessage = "very overweight or obese"
action_details.action_postfix: "very overweight or obese" cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultMessage = the result's resultMessage + " --->from" + gap + "days ago's data:"+bMI_tmp's bMI
action_details.action_postfix: result entitypush resultMessage " --->from" strconcat 2 local@ strconcat "days ago's data:" strconcat 0 local@ entitypush bMI entitypop strconcat entitypop cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

context_details.context_description: local int floorLength = the length of floors_Devs
context_details.context_postfix: floors_Devs length cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: local int hRLength = the length of hR_Devs
context_details.context_postfix: hR_Devs length cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: local int sleep_DevLength = the length of sleep_Devs
context_details.context_postfix: sleep_Devs length cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: local int steps_DevLength = the length of steps_Devs
context_details.context_postfix: steps_Devs length cvi allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: local int weightLength = the length of weight_Devs
context_details.context_postfix: weight_Devs length cvi allocate execute deallocate pop
sleep_Devs 0 getat cve allocate execute deallocate pop

action_details.action_description: add a new result entity to the context of this table
add the result to the patient's results
action_details.action_postfix: result patient entitypush results swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_description: perform Calculate_FloorsDev
set the result's resultCode = 11
set the result's resultMessage = "your average floors is "+caltemp/floorLength
action_details.action_postfix: "your average floors is " caltemp 1 local@ fdiv strconcat cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set caltemp = 0
add a new result entity to the context of this table
add the result to the patient's results
action_details.action_postfix: result patient entitypush results swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultCode = 10
set the result's resultMessage = "No Floor_Dev data of the patient…"
action_details.action_postfix: "No Floor_Dev data of the patient…" cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: add a new result entity to the context of this table
add the result to the patient's results
action_details.action_postfix: result patient entitypush results swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_description: perform Calculate_HRDev
set the result's resultCode = 21
set the result's resultMessage = "your recent "+floorLength+" average HR is "+caltemp/floorLength
action_details.action_postfix: "your recent " 1 local@ strconcat " average HR is " strconcat caltemp 1 local@ fdiv strconcat cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set caltemp = 0
add a new result entity to the context of this table
add the result to the patient's results
action_details.action_postfix: result patient entitypush results swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultCode = 20
set the result's resultMessage = "No HR_Dev data of the patient…"
action_details.action_postfix: "No HR_Dev data of the patient…" cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: add a new result entity to the context of this table
add the result to the patient's results
action_details.action_postfix: result patient entitypush results swap addto entitypop

set the result's resultMessage = "No Sleep_Dev data of the patient…"
action_details.action_postfix: "No Sleep_Dev data of the patient…" cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: add a new result entity to the context of this table
add the result to the patient's results
action_details.action_postfix: result patient entitypush results swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultCode = 40
set the result's resultMessage = "No Steps_Dev data of the patient…"
action_details.action_postfix: "No Steps_Dev data of the patient…" cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: add a new result entity to the context of this table
add the result to the patient's results
action_details.action_postfix: result patient entitypush results swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultCode = 50
set the result's resultMessage = "No Weight_Dev data of the patient…"
action_details.action_postfix: "No Weight_Dev data of the patient…" cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: add a new result entity to the context of this table
add the result to the patient's results
action_details.action_postfix: result patient entitypush results swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultCode = 31
set the result's resultMessage = "your recent sleep result is: "+ firstSLP_tmp's sleepResults
action_details.action_postfix: "your recent sleep result is: " 6 local@ entitypush sleepResults entitypop strconcat cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultMessage = the result's resultMessage + "--->" + the string value of callfunction("edu.dhu.lib.DevUtils.TestSleep<entity>", patient)
action_details.action_postfix: result entitypush resultMessage "--->" strconcat patient "edu.dhu.lib.DevUtils.TestSleep<entity>" callfunction cvs strconcat entitypop cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set caltemp = 0
add a new result entity to the context of this table
add the result to the patient's results
action_details.action_postfix: result patient entitypush results swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_description: perform Calculate_StepsDev
set the result's resultCode = 41
set the result's resultMessage = "your recent "+steps_DevLength+" average Steps is "+caltemp/steps_DevLength
action_details.action_postfix: "your recent " 4 local@ strconcat " average Steps is " strconcat caltemp 4 local@ fdiv strconcat cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultMessage = the result's resultMessage + "--->" + the string value of callfunction("edu.dhu.lib.DevUtils.TestSteps<entity>", patient)
action_details.action_postfix: result entitypush resultMessage "--->" strconcat patient "edu.dhu.lib.DevUtils.TestSteps<entity>" callfunction cvs strconcat entitypop cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set caltemp = 0
add a new result entity to the context of this table
add the result to the patient's results
action_details.action_postfix: result patient entitypush results swap addto entitypop

action_details.action_description: perform Calculate_WeightDev
set the result's resultCode = 52
set the result's resultMessage = "your recent "+steps_DevLength+" average Weight is "+caltemp/steps_DevLength
action_details.action_postfix: "your recent " 4 local@ strconcat " average Weight is " strconcat caltemp 4 local@ fdiv strconcat cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set the result's resultMessage = the result's resultMessage + "--->" + the string value of callfunction("edu.dhu.lib.DevUtils.TestWeight<entity>", patient)
action_details.action_postfix: result entitypush resultMessage "--->" strconcat patient "edu.dhu.lib.DevUtils.TestWeight<entity>" callfunction cvs strconcat entitypop cvs result entitypush /resultMessage xdef entitypop

action_details.action_description: set caltemp = 0
set caltemp = caltemp + floors_Dev's floors
action_details.action_postfix: caltemp floors_Dev entitypush floors entitypop fadd cvr /caltemp xdef

action_details.action_description: set caltemp = caltemp + hR_Dev's HR
action_details.action_postfix: caltemp hR_Dev entitypush HR entitypop fadd cvr /caltemp xdef

action_details.action_description: set caltemp = caltemp + sleep_Dev's sleepMeasurement
action_details.action_postfix: caltemp sleep_Dev entitypush sleepMeasurement entitypop fadd cvr /caltemp xdef

action_details.action_description: set caltemp = caltemp + steps_Dev's steps
action_details.action_postfix: caltemp steps_Dev entitypush steps entitypop fadd cvr /caltemp xdef

action_details.action_description: set caltemp = caltemp + weight_Dev's weight
action_details.action_postfix: caltemp weight_Dev entitypush weight entitypop fadd cvr /caltemp xdef
